block.p: PELTZ--Claire. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the loss of Claire Peltz, beloved mother of Nelson Peltz and mother-in-law of Claudia Peltz, compassionate leaders of the New York Jewish community. Nelson's boundless generosity and commitment to homelessness, and human rights has enriched the lives of millions around the globe. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Claudia and Nelson; to their children; and to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O.
